name: Capcom Generation 4: Dai 4 Shuu Kokou no Eiyuu
name_original: Capcom Generation 4: Dai 4 Shuu Kokou no Eiyuu
description:
Capcom Generation 4: Dai 4 Shuu Kokou no Eiyuu (カプコン・ジェネレーション　～第４集　孤高の英雄～) is a Action/Compilation video game published by Capcom released on November 12th, 1998 for the Sony PlayStation & Sega Saturn.
Commando (Senjō no Ōkami)
Gun.Smoke
*Mercs (Senjō no Ōkami II)
